game.name: Climb The Backrooms
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Ascend through the twisted levels of the Backrooms using physics-based object manipulation to overcome obstacles, solve mind-bending puzzles, and uncover unsettling secrets. Play solo or team up in online co-op with up to 4 players as you climb higher, think smarter, and survive the unknown.
